benchmark_details.name: BugCraft-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: BugCraft-Bench is a curated dataset of Minecraft crash bug reports, designed to evaluate the BugCraft framework, which automates the reproduction of crash bugs in Minecraft from user-submitted reports.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized dataset for evaluating automated game bug reproduction systems, specifically focusing on Minecraft crash bugs.

data.annotation: Manually verified by researchers to ensure reproducibility and quality.

methodology.calculation: Success rate calculated as the percentage of bugs successfully reproduced out of total attempts.
methodology.interpretation: A higher success rate indicates better automated reproduction capabilities.
methodology.validation: Validation conducted through manual reviews comparing generated steps against original bug reports.
